item.title: Forge
item.description: Forge is a CLI utility I originally wrote to manage the complexity of my database models in my Governor project. I dislike using ORM’s, since they place many constraints on the types of queries that can be written, or they make those queries unnecessarily difficult to write with a complex API due to language limitations. SQL itself, however, is a clear and purpose built language for querying relational data. Thus, I chose to write all my database queries with templated SQL strings (with sanitized input, of course).
